mapper.select: SELECT file_name, file_size, md5, update_time, version FROM client_file ORDER BY update_time DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT file_name , file_size , MD5 , update_time , VERSION , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY MD5 ORDER BY update_time DESC) AS r0 FROM client_file ) t1 WHERE r0 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client_file (file_name, file_size, md5, version) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{md5}, #{version})
mapper.update: UPDATE client_file SET file_name = #{fileName}, file_size = #{fileSize}, md5 = #{md5}, update_time = now()
